Summary: Bright flash that lit up area then dimmed immediately. Three side by side spheres were visible then vanished
trends: There have been no other sightings in Selfridge
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailson august 23, 2011 at 9:30 pm cst, i was driving south on hwy 6, between shields, nd junction & selfridge, nd, when a bright flash illuminated the sky & surrounding area. i immediately thought it was lightning then immediately noticed there were no clouds in sky. looking east in the direction from where the light came & as the flash\lights were dimming, i could see three stationary lights\spheres aligned side by side which vanished immediately. i woke my passenger but the light was gone already. i told her what i saw, then pulled to the side of the road & we scanned the sky immediately but could not see anything related to the incident. we are located in a rural area & i have never seen anything like this in the 30+ years i have lived in the area. i would compare it to an old time flash bulb camera or like someone\something was taking a picture & needed the area illuminated, but on a much larger scale. ellsworth air force base is about 230 miles to the southwest & minot air force base is located about 165 miles to the northwest. i have seen military aircraft flying in our area on occasion however i am not aware of any type of machine that is capable of producing the light i saw & disappearing just as quickly.
